data.actual_result: Other roles also change order and it takes multiple attempts to make it work right
data.expected_result: The role will move to where it should go and none of the other ones will move
data.short_description: Order of the roles gets SUPER messed up when moving them around.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to server settings - Click on "roles" - Make sure there are a few roles (around 7 or so would be ideal) - Click "edit" - Drag one of the roles either from low in the list to high in the list or vice versa - Press "done" - IMPORTANT NOTE!!! This does not happen EVERY time. Please attempt to reproduce multiple times before denying this report
